import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Template from '../components/Template' import ResponseError from '../utils/ResponseError' import axios from 'axios' import config from '../config' import * as dayjs from 'dayjs' import Modal from '../components/Modal' const ReportChanagePackage = () => { const [memberPackage, setMemberPackage] = useState([]) const [arrHours] = useState(() => { let arr = [] for (let i = 1; i <= 24; i++) { arr.push(i) } return arr; }) const [minutes] = useState(() => { let arr = [] for (let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { const element = array[i]; } }) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) const fetchData = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get(config.path + '/change-package/list', config.headers()) if (res.data.status) { setMemberPackage(res.data.data) } } catch (error) { ResponseError(error.message) } } return ( <>

นาที
 ) } export default ReportChanagePackage
